---
title: "rcm requested fixes"
author: "Martin Barner"
date: "25 February 2019"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

  library("researchcyclematrix")
  rcm<-rcm_download()
  subs<-subs_download()
  inc<-rcm_check(rcm)
  inc$fatal<-inc$issue=="file-id-name not unique"



```

## Fatal inconsistencies

```{r}
tibble(`non unique uuids (data unit only)`=inc[inc$unit=="data" & inc$fatal,c("file id")]) %>%  kable

```
```{r}
tibble(`non unique uuids (not data unit)`=inc[inc$unit!="data" & inc$fatal,c("file id")]) %>%  kable

```


## Secondary inconsistencies


```{r}

inc[!inc$fatal,c("file id", "issue","comment")] %>% kable

```
